channel.title: Need to eat food eat system [HELP please]
channel.description:
Hi all I have a very stable server everything work
But when i eat manta or any food i cant see my hp going up Example : I eated manta ray my hp was 12 and it keep 12 It dont change But i can see my character eated it Any 1 can give me code and tell me where i put it If in client.java or what and thanks

item.title: Need to eat food eat system [HELP please]
item.dc:creator: @killer4y killer4y
item.description:
@killer4y wrote:

@Dastan

I found this code

case 391: if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 1700) return; c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis(); (c.setAnimation(0x33D);) //c.playSound(317, 000, 020); c.sM("You eat the manta ray."); if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){ c.sM("It heals some health."); } c.deleteItem(391, slot, 1); 
            c.currentHealth += 22;
            if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
                c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
            c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016);
            break;</blockquote>

I paste your code and in compiler show 100 error
so nothing work xD

Read full topic
item.source: Need to eat food eat system [HELP please]

try Dastan’s method

item.title: Need to eat food eat system [HELP please]
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

go to potions.java and search for

391

and you should come across this code

[code=cmf]case 391:
if (System.currentTimeMillis() - c.foodDelay < 1700)
return;
c.foodDelay = System.currentTimeMillis();
if(c.eatemote==0){c.setAnimation(0x33D);}
//c.playSound(317, 000, 020);
c.sM(“You eat the manta ray.”);
if(c.currentHealth < c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints]){
c.sM(“It heals some health.”);
}
if(c.currentHealth <= 0) {
break;
}
c.deleteItem(391, slot, 1);

			c.currentHealth += 22;
			if (c.currentHealth > c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints])
				c.currentHealth = c.playerLevel[c.playerHitpoints];
			c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016);
			break;[/code]

this line is how much you heal by eating this food

c.currentHealth += 22;

Read full topic
